fullplot: Two dimwit sewage workers watch their hero, WCW wrestler Jimmy King, get screwed out of the World title by wrestler Diamond Dallas Page and evil WCW owner Titus Sinclair. They embark on a quest to help their hero win his title - and honor - back. Features cameos by lots of WCW wrestlers.
plot: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.
title: Ready to Rumble

tomatoes.consensus: Humor at its lowest that isn't funny for kids and is insulting to adults.
